abstract: Hormel Foods will buy organic meats producer Applegate Farms for roughly $775 million; deal signals company's push toward diversification.
lead_paragraph: The deal was Hormel’s largest acquisition ever and signaled even more clearly the efforts of Jeffrey M. Ettinger, its chief executive, to diversify the company.

headline.main: Hormel Foods to Buy Applegate Farms for $775 Million
headline.print_headline: Hormel Foods to Buy Applegate Farms for $775 Million to Add Natural and Organic Meat

snippet: The deal was Hormel’s largest acquisition ever and signaled even more clearly the efforts of Jeffrey M. Ettinger, its chief executive, to diversify the company.
